formalpara.title: Internal help for this AMI command in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen: Action: SIPqualifypeer Synopsis: Show SIP peer (text format) Privilege: system,reporting,all Description: Show one SIP peer with details on current status. Variables: Peer: <name> The peer name you want to check. ActionID: <id> Optional action ID for this AMI transaction.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
